Hint: Welcome to the Sleep invasion. Try to explore the map and solve the puzzles. Enjoy!
You can move with WASD and jump with SPACE.
That's the DIARY OF PRINCESS! You can access it through the inventory (Press I) or simply by pressing 1 on keyboard.
Press left mouse to pick up or interact with items.
Click digit to change number on lock.
You can access the MAGNIFIER through the inventory (Press I) or simply by pressing 2 on keyboard.
You can access the SHADER through the inventory (Press I) or simply by pressing 3 on keyboard.
The password must be somewhere.
Press right mouse to zoom in and M to use MAGNIFIER. Press R to return.

You can place things from your inventory here.

Hint: Press Q and E for turning the pages. Press R to return.
Condition: when the diary is being used

Hint: You can click on the MAYA STONE rings to rotate.
This is the Inventory. All of the picked Items can be inspected here.
This is the Inspect panel. You can rotate inspect the chosen items.
You can see the unseen using the SHADER. Press R to return.
The main door is now open.
Thank you for playing SLEEP INVASION. We can't wait to see you solving the puzzles again. Feel free to explore the map.
